thread.title: texas mike
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by texas mike

author: texas mike
title: texas mike
text: Paul has done a great job from Quote: s, to helping us choose the right coverages, to finalizing the deal. He could not have been more knowledgeable or helpful. He proved to be the consummate professional. Oh yeah we are paying $700.00 less for nearly identical coverage on home and auto than with USAA. Now hopefully we never have to make claims, but if we do THAT is when we find out how good the coverage is. We were extremely happy with USAA's service but $700 is $700.
